pageContext.claim: “New Fox Poll shows a ‘40% Approval Rating by African Americans for President Trump, a record for Republicans.’ Thank you, a great honor!”
pageContext.analysis: This Fox News poll doesn't exist. Trump was seemingly referring to a Rasmussen poll showing 40 percent approval among African Americans. However, Rasmussen is consistently an outlier and more reputable polls show Trump's support among blacks in the single digits.
